panels.title: Today vs Historical Average
panels.description: Hourly activity pattern: Today (solid) vs Average (dashed)

targets.query:
import "date"

// Today's activity - count of presence events per hour
from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state" or r._measurement == "binary_sensor" or r._measurement == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id =~ /xiaomi_03_85df_occupancy_sensor|gramps_living_room_motion|gramps_conservatory_motion/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != "unavailable" and r._value != "unknown")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Today")

import "date"

// Historical average by hour of day (last 30 days excluding today)
from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state" or r._measurement == "binary_sensor" or r._measurement == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id =~ /xiaomi_03_85df_occupancy_sensor|gramps_living_room_motion|gramps_conservatory_motion/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != "unavailable" and r._value != "unknown")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with hour: date.hour(t: r._time) }))
  |> group(columns: ["hour"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: date.add(d: duration(v: string(v: r.hour) + "h"), to: today()), _field: "Historical Average" }))

panels.title: First Activity Time (Today)
panels.description: When was activity first detected this morning

targets.query:

  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state" or r._measurement == "binary_sensor" or r._measurement == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id =~ /xiaomi_03_85df_occupancy_sensor|gramps_living_room_motion|gramps_conservatory_motion/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != "unavailable" and r._value != "unknown" and r._value != "0" and r._value != "off" and r._value != "no_one")
